SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.object

Interface Movable<L,R>

Type Parameters:
L - The datatype to use to represent location
R - The datatype to use to represent rotation
All Superinterfaces:
Unique<UUID>
All Known Subinterfaces:
BigMovable2, BigMovable3, Movable2, Movable3, SingleMovable2, SingleMovable3
public interface Movable<L,R> extends Unique<UUID>
A movable object can be placed in a world, and have a location and rotation of arbitrary data types Movable and Movable.
See Also:
  • Movable2
  • Movable3
  • SingleMovable2
  • SingleMovable3
  • BigMovable2
  • BigMovable3
